name: Trial of might
text: Hmph you again.... /nIf you seek an audience with me you will have to prove your worth to me! /nHmm...So a trial of g&combat! You will fight a.... r&Golem! Yes an Iron Golem! /nI will deem you worthy to be in my presence. /nIf you survive....-evil giggle-...uh...cough cough...off you go!
